createcentralizationrulefororganization.name: CreateCentralizationRuleForOrganization
createcentralizationrulefororganization.description: Grants permission to create a new organization centralization rule with the specified name for the organization

createtelemetryrule.name: CreateTelemetryRule
createtelemetryrule.description: Grants permission to create a new telemetry rule with the specified name for the account

createtelemetryrulefororganization.name: CreateTelemetryRuleForOrganization
createtelemetryrulefororganization.description: Grants permission to create a new organization telemetry rule with the specified name for the organization

deletecentralizationrulefororganization.name: DeleteCentralizationRuleForOrganization
deletecentralizationrulefororganization.description: Grants permission to delete an organization centralization rule with the specified name for the organization

deletetelemetryrule.name: DeleteTelemetryRule
deletetelemetryrule.description: Grants permission to delete a telemetry rule with the specified name for the account

deletetelemetryrulefororganization.name: DeleteTelemetryRuleForOrganization
deletetelemetryrulefororganization.description: Grants permission to delete an organization telemetry rule with the specified name for the organization

getcentralizationrulefororganization.name: GetCentralizationRuleForOrganization
getcentralizationrulefororganization.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified organization centralization rule for the organization

gettelemetryenrichmentstatus.name: GetTelemetryEnrichmentStatus
gettelemetryenrichmentstatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status of the Resource tags for telemetry feature for the account

gettelemetryevaluationstatus.name: GetTelemetryEvaluationStatus
gettelemetryevaluationstatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Telemetry Config feature status for the account

gettelemetryevaluationstatusfororganizat.name: GetTelemetryEvaluationStatusForOrganization
gettelemetryevaluationstatusfororganizat.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Telemetry Config feature status for the organization

gettelemetryrule.name: GetTelemetryRule
gettelemetryrule.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified telemetry rule for the account

gettelemetryrulefororganization.name: GetTelemetryRuleForOrganization
gettelemetryrulefororganization.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified organization telemetry rule for the organization

listcentralizationrulesfororganization.name: ListCentralizationRulesForOrganization
listcentralizationrulesfororganization.description: Grants permission to list the centralization rules for the organization

listresourcetelemetry.name: ListResourceTelemetry
listresourcetelemetry.description: Grants permission to retrieve telemetry configurations for resources associated with the account

listresourcetelemetryfororganization.name: ListResourceTelemetryForOrganization
listresourcetelemetryfororganization.description: Grants permission to retrieve telemetry configurations for resources associated with accounts in the organization

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified resource

listtelemetryrules.name: ListTelemetryRules
listtelemetryrules.description: Grants permission to list the telemetry rules for the account

listtelemetryrulesfororganization.name: ListTelemetryRulesForOrganization
listtelemetryrulesfororganization.description: Grants permission to list the telemetry rules for the organization

starttelemetryenrichment.name: StartTelemetryEnrichment
starttelemetryenrichment.description: Grants permission to enable the Resource tags for telemetry feature for the account

starttelemetryevaluation.name: StartTelemetryEvaluation
starttelemetryevaluation.description: Grants permission to start the Telemetry Config feature for the account

starttelemetryevaluationfororganization.name: StartTelemetryEvaluationForOrganization
starttelemetryevaluationfororganization.description: Grants permission to start the Telemetry Config feature for the organization

stoptelemetryenrichment.name: StopTelemetryEnrichment
stoptelemetryenrichment.description: Grants permission to disable the Resource tags for telemetry feature for the account

stoptelemetryevaluation.name: StopTelemetryEvaluation
stoptelemetryevaluation.description: Grants permission to stop the Telemetry Config feature for the account

stoptelemetryevaluationfororganization.name: StopTelemetryEvaluationForOrganization
stoptelemetryevaluationfororganization.description: Grants permission to stop the Telemetry Config feature for the organization

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add or update the specified tags for the specified resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the specified resource

updatecentralizationrulefororganization.name: UpdateCentralizationRuleForOrganization
updatecentralizationrulefororganization.description: Grants permission to update the specified centralization rule for the organization

updatetelemetryrule.name: UpdateTelemetryRule
updatetelemetryrule.description: Grants permission to update the specified telemetry rule for the account

updatetelemetryrulefororganization.name: UpdateTelemetryRuleForOrganization
updatetelemetryrulefororganization.description: Grants permission to update the specified telemetry rule for the organization
